homeContent.mainTitle: Kitnets.com — The complete platform for kitnets, studios, and compact properties
mainIntro: Kitnets.com is the first platform in Brazil created exclusively for kitnets, studios, and compact properties, combining smart property search, professional rental management, and real-time market data.
Here, residents, owners, brokers, agencies, and developers operate in the same ecosystem, with organized information, digital processes, and intelligence to make better decisions.

sections.title: Find your ideal kitnet with more precision
sections.description: If you are looking for a kitnet to rent or buy, Kitnets.com offers:
items: Ads focused on compact properties
Smart filters by city, neighborhood, and price
Automatic alerts when new properties become available
Fewer irrelevant ads, more real opportunities
sections.footer: You don't waste time. You find what you are looking for.

sections.title: A new way to advertise properties
sections.description: For brokers, agencies, and owners, Kitnets.com is more than just an advertising portal. It is a professional platform to:
items: Advertise properties to a highly qualified audience
Manage contracts, rentals, and adjustments
Centralize communication with residents
Eliminate spreadsheets, manual controls, and scattered data

sections.title: Real estate management like never before in Brazil
sections.description: Kitnets.com works as a complete real estate SaaS, offering:
items: Clear and real-time dashboards
Automatic reports
Performance and profitability metrics
KPIs unseen in the Brazilian market
Organized history of properties, contracts, and values
sections.footer: Here, properties stop being a “black box” and become data-monitored assets.

sections.title: Market intelligence to decide better
sections.description: Kitnets.com uses real market data to generate insights such as:
items: Price ranges by neighborhood and city
Rental and demand trends
Regional comparisons
Support for new investment decisions
sections.footer: Ideal for those who want to invest, expand, or move to a new city with more security.

sections.title: A platform for everyone involved
items: Residents receive alerts, follow the market, and open maintenance requests
Owners track performance, contracts, and profitability
Brokers and agencies scale their operation with lower costs
Developers validate demand and find the right investors
sections.footer: Everyone connected, with consistent data and clear processes.

sections.title: Created for the Artificial Intelligence era
sections.description: Kitnets.com was architected from the beginning for the AI era, with:
items: Structured data
Process automation
Foundation for intelligent agents and advanced reports
Preparation for the future of the real estate market
sections.footer: It is not just a real estate site. It is a digital infrastructure for the compact property market.

sections.title: Kitnets.com is for you if:
items: You are looking for a kitnet or studio
You want to advertise properties more efficiently
You wish to manage rentals professionally
You seek real data to invest better
You want to get away from spreadsheets and improvisation

mortgageCalculatorPage.title: Mortgage Amortization Simulator (SAC and PRICE)
mortgageCalculatorPage.subtitle: The power of amortization: discover what banks don't explain about interest, terms, and savings.

intro.text1: Few people know, but the way you amortize a mortgage can save tens — or even hundreds — of thousands in interest.
intro.text2: Banks don't explain this clearly because the longer you take to pay off the loan, the more interest and insurance you pay.
intro.text3: The good news is that with the right strategy, you can turn this game in your favor.
intro.listTitle: With this Real Estate Amortization Simulator (SAC and PRICE), you can visualize exactly:
listItems: How the outstanding balance evolves over time
The real impact of early amortizations
The difference between reducing the installment or reducing the term
How much you save in interest, MIP, and DFI
The effect of using FGTS every 24 months
intro.text4: All this with a detailed table, similar to the bank's, and clear charts showing the before and after of amortizations.

whatToSimulate.title: What this simulator allows you to do
whatToSimulate.list5Title: Access a detailed table, in bank standard, with:

whyAmortize.title: Why does amortizing change everything?
whyAmortize.subtitle: Why is early amortization so powerful?
whyAmortize.text1: In a mortgage, interest and MIP insurance are calculated on the outstanding balance.
listItems: The total cost of the financing plummets
whyAmortize.text3: In other words: amortizing early is worth much more than amortizing late.
whyAmortize.text4: This simulator shows this visually and numerically — something that usually only appears hidden in technical bank spreadsheets.

fgtsSection.title: Using FGTS to amortize: is it worth it?
fgtsSection.text1: In most loans, FGTS can be used every 24 months for amortization.
listItems: Whether it is better to reduce the installment or term
The real impact on the final amount paid
fgtsSection.text2: Thus, you decide based on numbers — not guesswork.

ctaSection.title: Simulate now and see how much you can save
ctaSection.text1: Fill in your loan details, test different amortization strategies, and discover how much time and money you can save.
ctaSection.text2: In many cases, savings exceed R$ 100,000 in interest over the contract.
